name: agent-flow
description: AgentFlow is an intelligent agentic workflow system that manages tasks, dependencies, and reasoning for AI Agents.

tools.name: plan_task
tools.description: Create a development plan for a given task or feature.

tools.name: execute_task
tools.description: Execute a specific task from the plan.

tools.name: verify_task
tools.description: Verify the completion of a task against its criteria.
